channel.title: How do i make a person in non wild

item.title: How do i make a person in non wild
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Ive got it, but its pretty long.
Sorry but this just might have to do for now,

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >= 2790 && absX <= 2855 && absY >= 3418 && absY <=3466 ) || (absX >= 2584 && absX <= 2612 && absY >= 3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >= 2935 && absX <= 3066 && absY >= 2935 && absY <= 3399 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2747 && absX <=2758 && absY >=2794 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2764 && absX <=2776 && absY >=2793 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2773 && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766 && absY <=2770 ) || (absX >=2751 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2777 ) || (absX >=2785 && absX <=2809 && absY >=2771 && absY <=2801 ) || (absX >=2732 && absX <=2740 && absY >=2789 && absY <=2796 ) || (absX >=2861 && absX <=2872 && absY >=10186 && absY <=10212 ) || (absX >=3409 && absX <=3452 && absY >=3532 && absY <=3575 ) || (absX >=2435 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3080 && absY <=3099 ) || (absX >=3267 && absX <=3332 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3270 ) || (absX >=3151 && absX <=3182 && absY >=3220 && absY <=3272 ) || (absX >=3032 && absX <=3063 && absY >=3424 && absY <=3457 ) || (absX >=3476 && absX <=3501 && absY >=9483 && absY <=9505 ) || (absX >=2942 && absX <=2992 && absY >=3390 && absY <=3414 ) || (absX >=2420 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 ) || (absX >=3071 && absX <=3122 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >=3101 && absX <=3124 && absY >=9825 && absY <=9849 ) || (absX >=2585 && absX <=2605 && absY >=3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >=2853 && absX <=2926 && absY >=3530 && absY <=3577 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2622 && absY >=3841 && absY <=3902 ) || (absX >=2887 && absX <=2699 && absY >=2939 && absY <=2741 ) || (absX >=2742 && absX <=2815 && absY >=3146 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2692 && absX <=2810 && absY >=2690 && absY <=2808 ) || (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878 && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

item.title: How do i make a person in non wild
item.dc:creator: @killdogz killdogz
item.description:
@killdogz wrote:

Ok do you want it to be non-wild? Becouse if you want it to be non wild add this

search for
Code:

public boolean nonWild()

and then just add this under 1 of the others…
Code:

|| (absX >= x1 && absX <= x2 && absY >= y1 && absY <=y2)

Fill in the x1,x2,y1,and y2.

You need to explain how to do it. i’ll explain

open client.java and search

public boolean nonWild()

and u should see

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||

use this and add it

|| (absX >= x1 && absX <= x2 && absY >= y1 && absY <=y2)

here how to add the cords

for x1 and y1 walk far south-west for the safe spot to start and for x2 and y2 walk as far north-east till u want the safe spot to stop.

hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a person in non wild
item.dc:creator: @richcookerscape richcookerscape
item.description:
@richcookerscape wrote:

[quote=“Geoffrey11, post:1, topic:226920”]OK lol, My assults bugged in a wild heres the code idk what to do ive tried so many idk what nonwild code to add:\

if (isInAssault()){
sM(“You can’t follow in assault!”);
return;

if helped Rep++[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2008, 08:40:03 am[/size][hr]dumb…[/quote]

Ok do you want it to be non-wild? Becouse if you want it to be non wild add this

search for

public boolean nonWild()

and then just add this under 1 of the others…

|| (absX >= x1 && absX <= x2 && absY >= y1 && absY <=y2)

Fill in the x1,x2,y1,and y2.

Ok the first place you go to you fill in ur first x1, and ur first y1, then the second place you go to you fill in x2, and y2.

first one go to the southeast conner and then the second one you go to the northeast conner.
